title: US tech shifts on AI manufacturing, power
description: TECHNOLOGY giants are reshaping manufacturing, chip supply chains and energy sourcing in the US as artificial intelligence (AI) demand accelerates, according to reports posted at Mobile World Live.
content:

title: Dell expects AI server revenue to double in 2027
description: DELL said it expects revenue from its key artificial intelligence-optimized servers business to double in fiscal year 2027 and promised to return more cash to shareholders, sending its shares surging 10 percent in extended trading.
content:

title: AI boom is reshaping the global memory industry
description: INDUSTRY analysts have begun using the term “RAMmageddon” to describe what they previously forecasted as a looming imbalance in the global memory market. Semiconductor manufacturers reject the label and describe the shift as a strategic reallocation of production toward high-bandwidth memory (HBM), the component that allows artificial intelligence (AI) systems to operate at scale.
content: INDUSTRY analysts have begun using the term “RAMmageddon” to describe what they previously forecasted as a looming imbalance in the global memory market. Semiconductor manufacturers reject the label and describe the shift as a strategic reallocation ... [5706 chars]

title: Altman defends artificial intelligence energy use compared to human training
description: OPENAI chief executive Sam Altman defended the resource demands of artificial intelligence (AI) at the India AI Impact Summit 2026, arguing that comparisons between AI systems and human activity often misrepresent how energy and water use should be measured.
content: OPENAI chief executive Sam Altman defended the resource demands of artificial intelligence (AI) at the India AI Impact Summit 2026, arguing that comparisons between AI systems and human activity often misrepresent how energy and water use should be m... [3599 chars]

title: ‘From fragile five to global growth engine’: PM Modi slams Congress, says developed nations lining up for India trade deals
description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi sharply criticized the Congress party. He presented India as a confident and rising economic power, eager for trade deals. Modi highlighted the nation's push for self-reliance to reduce import costs. He also stated India is actively shaping the artificial intelligence revolution. The government aims for an empowered and prosperous Bharat by 2047.
content:

title: Security, identity risks result from chip shortage
description: EXPOSURE management firm Tenable unveiled its Cloud and AI Security Risk Report 2026 last Feb. 23, warning that organizations across the Asia-Pacific region are slipping into a “zero-margin AI exposure gap” as rapid artificial intelligence adoption and reliance on third-party code outpace human-led security efforts.

title: AI Boost for Marathi: Fadnavis Envisions Global Reach
description: Maharashtra Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis announced plans to leverage Artificial Intelligence to promote the Marathi language globally. Speaking at the 4th World Marathi Conference, he emphasized developing language labs in schools and utilizing AI to enhance Marathi’s scope and relevance worldwide. The event honored significant contributors to Marathi literature.
content: Maharashtra Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis, at the 4th World Marathi Conference, pledged to harness Artificial Intelligence (AI) for advancing the Marathi language globally. Fadnavis emphasized the need for Marathi to become not only a language of ... [705 chars]

title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - AI Boost for Marathi: Fadnavis Envisions Global Reach
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.

title: AI toys leak 50,000 children’s conversations. They’re still on the market
description: Artificial intelligence is quickly moving from offices and smartphones into one of the most sensitive spaces imaginable: children’s bedrooms. AI-powered toys are now being marketed to kids as young as three, often equipped with microphones, cloud connectivity, and the ability to store conversations to personalize interactions. title: OpenAI raises $110 billion in record funding round
description: OpenAI has announced a massive $110 billion funding round valuing the ChatGPT maker at $730 billion, with SoftBank, Nvidia and Amazon each making multi-billion-dollar commitments as the artificial intelligence company races to meet surging global demand.
